mapper.select: select cl_clname,cl_id,cl_lv, cl_lcnum, cl_pt, pc_cont, pi_pisysname from cc inner join cl on cc_cc = cl_cc inner join pi on cl_idnum=pi_idnum and cl_lv = pi_lv inner join pc on cl_idnum=pc_idnum and cl_lv = pc_lv where cl_ct=2 and cc_check = 1 group by cl_clname,cl_id,cl_lv, cl_lcnum, cl_pt, pc_cont, pi_pisysname
